caption: The video showcases the sweet daily life of a young couple. In the beginning, they are seen dancing together in a public square. Following this joyful moment, the man begins a job as a food delivery worker, while the woman goes off to work in a shopping mall. After delivering food, the man rides his motorcycle on the road, impulsively letting go of the handlebars in a moment of carefree fun. However, the outcome is predictable: he takes a tumble and ends up falling off his bike. When he gets home, the woman carefully tends to his wounds. In a tender exchange, the man then pulls out a gift from his pocket to give to the woman, and they enjoy a sweet and intimate moment together.
